ygData.subject: Re: Boat Crashes
ygData.msgSnippet: My friend and I got caught in our first boat crash ever. We were happily journeying on the boat, and we hit the zone to Freeport. All of a sudden, EQ
ygData.messageBody:
My friend and I got caught in our first boat crash ever. We were happily
journeying on the boat, and we hit the zone to Freeport. All of a sudden, EQ
disappeared, and in it's place a BIG GPF! EQ had crashed...ACK! The friend I
was with confirmed that it had happened to him as well (we were talking on
the phone at the time). I finally get back in the game, and when I log in, I
am standing on the boat...in East Freeport. Whew... So , as I get ready to
jump ship....BAM, we zoned into Ocean of Tears....NOOOOOOOO!!!!! *Sigh* I
petitioned a GM, and he was very kind though, and teleported my friend and I
to Freeport...but not until I had traveled all the way back to Kaladim
again....

You Have been Summoned by the Gods...
LOADING...PLEASE WAIT


Hehe, bet many of you have never seen that message. The only bummer was
about 20 minutes wasted, and the free binds we had lined up from a friend
were gone, since he was halfway to Oasis by the time we got ourselves back
to Freeport. I'm still not bound there either, since I couldn't get anyone
to bind last night. So I just camped. I'll try again today I suppose...

Lulen
9th Rank Bard
Solusek Ro

----- Original Message -----
From: Douglass Family <frd@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, June 19, 1999 14:03
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Boat Crashes


> From: "Douglass Family" <frd@...>
>
> Its a serious problem, I got dropped into the ocean of tears... spent 1.5
> hours swimming, thank god for the jig, finally made it to the Isle of the
> Sisters ( i was dropped just entering OOT from Kaladim), Then for a kick
in
> the pants I caught the boat at the isle, and entered the freeport zone,
got
> disconned, and appeared as boat was leaving Freeport, had to jumpship and
> swim to the docks. My swimming is 91 now.
>
> Jaezebel Bladesong, Gypsy Bard of the 19th Stanza
> Innouruuk
> -----Original Message-----
> From: VampyreDreams@... <VampyreDreams@...>
> To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Date: Thursday, June 17, 1999 12:38 PM
> Subject: [eqbards] Boat Crashes
>
>
> >From: VampyreDreams@...
> >
> >In a message dated 6/16/99 4:06:49 PM Mountain Daylight Time,
> >uber_sorcerer@... writes:
> >
> ><< was sitting lost all Stam down to 1 bubble and ppl on the boat kept
> >disappearing >>
> >
> >Greetings,
> >
> >I took my first boat ride the other night and also noticed stamina
> dropping.
> >Hmmm, also sounded like perhaps I was swimming? Ok, so I got up and
walked
> >around till that strange sound stopped. Stamina started picking up. Sat
> >down. Stamina started dropping again. Finally realized that it didn't
> >matter where I sat, sitting just plain drained my Stam.
> >
> >People disappearing, yes. Very strange. Could just be graphics glitch?
I
> >was in a party with a friend and we were in group speak so can't comment
on
> >/say. But it was a little disturbing to see your partner sitting there
one
> >second and then vanishing right before your eyes. But because of opinion
> on
> >this and other lists, I refrained from singing on the boat at all. Far
be
> it
> >for me, little lowly 6.5 songstress, to be the cause of a boat crash!
LOL
> >
> >I am enjoying the sage and experienced words of our higher level brothers
> and
> >sisters. But where are the young ones such as myself? The tales and
> >adventures I read here are things I won't be seeing for some time to
come.
> >Are there any others in the 5th to 10th season with advice and knowledge
to
> >share as well? Let's speak up and help each other with similar
questions.
> I
> >have questions as well which I will post later (time for work!).
> >
> >Calliope of Freeport
> >6th Season Half Elf Bard
> >
